Search over all networks using keyword or spatial object

Source: R/search_networks.R
search_networks.Rd

Search over all networks using keyword or spatial object

search_networks(query = NULL, verbose = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

query

character keyword used to search over all networks (case sensitive) or a sf object used to search in a specific geographical area. If keyword is unspecified (query = NULL), all networks will be returned.
verbose

a logical. Should extra information be reported on progress?
...

further arguments to be passed to rmangal::get_gen().

Value

An object of class mgSearchNetworks, which is a data.frame object with all networks informations

Examples

search_networks(query="insect%")
#> Found 14 networks

# NOT RUN {
# Spatial query
library(USAboundaries)
area <- us_states(state="california")
networks_in_area <- search_networks(area)
plot(networks_in_area)
# }
